subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: Every dispensary and enclosure set aside for the storage of narcotic substances and poisons must be able to be secured against entry.

subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: If a dispensary is located in a pharmacy that is capable of being secured against entry at all times while the dispensary is not in use, then the dispensary is deemed to be secured against entry.
